short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unofficial Floatplane quality of life extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This addon enables some quality-of-life features on the streaming service Floatplane. These features include dark mode, video progress, and a simple watchlist, all stored locally on your browser.

Not affiliated with or endorsed by Linus Media Group or Floatplane Inc.
